---

**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
**So that** [benefit]

### Details and Assumptions
* [Document what is assumed or known]

### Acceptance Criteria
``` Gherkin
Given [some context]
(And)
When [User has something happen]
(And)
Then [Something happens in response to user]
